response.name: Banku with Tilapia
response.description: Traditional fermented corn/cassava dough served with grilled tilapia and spicy shito sauce, common in coastal regions.

response.name: Jollof Rice
response.description: Colorful one-pot rice dish cooked with tomatoes, onions, and spices, popular at celebrations.

response.name: Waakye
response.description: Nutritious breakfast dish of rice and beans cooked in seasoned water with sorghum leaves, often served with spaghetti and fried plantain.

response.name: Fufu with Light Soup
response.description: Pounded cassava and plantain dough served with a flavorful broth containing tomatoes, vegetables, and either fish or meat.

response.name: Kelewele
response.description: Crunchy fried plantain slices spiced with ginger, chili, and salt, a popular street snack.
